name: @kawaz/colorize
description: A powerful rule-based log colorization tool with customizable token definitions and themes

scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run lint && bun run test && bun run build
scripts.release:patch: bun run prepublishOnly && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: bun run prepublishOnly && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: bun run prepublishOnly && npm version major && git push && git push --tags

author: kawaz
